bibl.title: Down and Out in Late Antique Tebtynis?
Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007
bibl.author: HICKEY, Todd M.

bibl.note: P. Lips. Inv. FF3. Sale on delivery. Theodosiopolis (Fayyum), 27.III.473. The agreement would seem to have something to contribute in support of the hypothesis that Theodosiopolis was the former Tebtynis.
HICKEY Todd M., Down and Out in Late Antique Tebtynis?

Sandra LIPPERT and Maren SCHENTULEIT (Edd.), Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007 (Wiesbaden, 2008) pp. 135-142, 1 pl.
